sentences.english: Ancient Chinese literary theory is living, and its structure is organic.

sentences.english: On the whole, average weekly hours are far below their pre-recession level.

sentences.english: The risk is that higher headline inflation is misinterpreted as a sign that policy is too loose.

sentences.english: The review will be conducted in tandem with the EC 's overall review of the education system.
